description: Formation of a new entrance with building identification signage recessed into the proposed cast stone frontage to the southern elevation (fronting Norman Street), formation of four number smoke outlet vents in the pavement to the south and west elevations, infilling of two light wells to form additional internal floorspace at second floor level and their replacement at roof level, alterations to the roof to include the formation of a glazed link addition, new roof to the north-west elevation at first floor level, installation of a roof light to the lift shaft at first floor level, and part replacement of existing roof, and installation of plant and safety equipment (at roof level).
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The works hereby permitted shall be begun no later than three years from the date of this consent.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
